header.title: How to build an XMLForm Wizard, Step Three

section.title: HowToBean.java
section.p: Next we create the simple JavaBean which holds the data filled in the form. Each value has a set and get method. Each value must map with the form data. This is done using JXPath.
Copy the file below and save it as HowToBean.java in the folder \apache\xml-cocoon2\src\scratchpad\src\org\apache\cocoon\samples\xmlform
Now we move on to Step 4:HowtoWizardAction.java
